translation.en: -Your lab partner left her shit. -[Ava] Ah!

translation.en: -About what happened earlier… -Nothing happened.

translation.en: [Ava] Once I access this database, we'll be able to look at everything and I'll be able to pare down Koslov…
translation.ja: データベースにアクセスしてコズロフの情報を…

translation.en: -Oh shit! -Oh! Fucking gross, Winters.

translation.en: -The fuck did you eat? -I don't think I ate.

translation.en: There's chunks of food in there. Is that quesadilla?

translation.en: There was quesadillas? No one told me there was quesadillas.
translation.ja: ケサディーヤがあったなんて知らなかった

translation.en: There were no quesadillas.
translation.ja: なかった

translation.en: Uh… Anybody have a mint?

translation.en: I could go for some quesadillas.

translation.en: Oh, shit, that may have been drugs.

translation.en: Fuck the computer.

translation.en: You want to get that bomb back? Drag Koslov out of his cell and beat it out of him.
translation.ja: コズロフを殴って情報を吐かせればいい

translation.en: Koslov is old-school. His father was KGB. He's not gonna give it up easy.
translation.ja: 奴の父親はＫＧＢよそう簡単に口を割らない

translation.en: He was prepared for this, knew what would happen if we captured him,
translation.ja: 捕まることも含め奴は全て計算済みよ

translation.en: he knows what happens next.
translation.ja: 今後の展開もね

translation.en: So we're all going to need to sober up real fucking quick.
translation.ja: だから さっさとシラフに戻らなきゃ

translation.en: If the nuke is still out there,
translation.ja: コズロフの仲間が核爆弾を持ってるなら⸺

translation.en: and one of Koslov's men has it, we're back to square one.
translation.ja: コズロフの仲間が核爆弾を持ってるなら⸺ 捜査は振り出しよ

translation.en: [man in Russian] The weapon is ready.
translation.ja: 〈準備できてる〉

translation.en: The countdown has begun.
translation.ja: 〈カウントダウンは始まった〉

translation.en: Have you made contact?
translation.ja: 〈接触したか？〉

translation.en: I have the NSA op.

translation.en: What's taking so long? Get in here, girl! [giggles]

translation.en: She doesn't suspect a thing.

translation.en: [in Russian] Excellent.
translation.ja: 〈よくやった〉

translation.en: Ooh! I hope there's champs in there, because we getting fucked…

translation.en: -Up! -Up!
translation.ja: 酔うぞ！

translation.en: I already knew. Whoo!

translation.en: All right, we all need to clear our minds,
translation.ja: みんな 頭をクリアにして

translation.en: forget anything that happened tonight, and get back on our A-game. ASAP.
translation.ja: 今夜 起きたことは忘れて任務に集中するのよ

translation.en: Everyone.
translation.ja: 全員よ

translation.en: -[Hagerty] Ladies and gentlemen. -Oh, God.
translation.ja: やあ 皆さん やだ！

translation.en: -Shit! -Fuck, Hagerty.

translation.en: Nope.

translation.en: -Hagerty has left the building. -Uh, no.

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -[Trunk] Shit!

translation.en: -Hagerty? -Oh, my God.

translation.en: -Let's go! We got commies to interrogate! -Let's go! Come on.

translation.en: -[Chad] Oh, shit! -[Trunk] Fuck.

translation.en: [Chad] Go!

translation.en: Everyone strap in!

translation.en: -Are you sure you're okay to fly? -Yep, I've got nothing in my system.

translation.en: Other than an entire bowl of chips and guac.

translation.en: Thank God one of us is sober.
